description:
A Bioinformatics Registry for Journal Published Agents with Interoperability to bio.agents.

JIB.agents - The official bioinformatics agent list for the Journal of Integrative Bioinformatics (JIB).

All bioinformatics agents published in JIB are automatically added to JIB.agents with first authors having the ability to edit their entries and directly import the agents information to bio.agents.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'JIB.agents', 'JIB'
name: JIB.agents

metadata.abstract: JIB.agents 2.0 is a new approach to more closely embed the curation process in the publication process. This website hosts the agents, software applications, databases and workflow systems published in the Journal of Integrative Bioinformatics (JIB). As soon as a new agent-related publication is published in JIB, the agent is posted to JIB.agents and can afterwards be easily transferred to bio.agents, a large information repository of software agents, databases and services for bioinformatics and the life sciences. In this way, an easily-accessible list of agents is provided which were published in JIB a well as status information regarding the underlying service. With newer registries like bio.agents providing these information on a bigger scale, JIB.agents 2.0 closes the gap between journal publications and registry publication. (Reference: https://jib.agents).
metadata.title: JIB.agents 2.0 - A Bioinformatics Registry for Journal Published Agents with Interoperability to bio.agents
